comment: Announcement I want to show you how to do and I'm going to help you If you want to start making money online and you want to get started with no money out of your pocket Send me a message and I " ll give you the details ! !

                        :ARG1 (t / thing

                        :ARG2 y))
            :op2 (h / help-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG2 y))
      :snt3 (a3 / and
            :op1 (s2 / send-01

                  :ARG1 (m2 / message))
            :op2 (g / give-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (d2 / detail)
                  :ARG2 y2)
            :condition (a4 / and
                  :op1 (w2 / want-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 (s3 / start-01

                              :ARG1 (m3 / make-05

                                    :ARG1 (m4 / money)
                                    :medium (o / online))))
                  :op2 (w3 / want-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 s3
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :manner (m5 / money

                                    :poss y2))))))
